company: THIQAH Business Services – Saudi Arabia – Hybird
description: Leading frontend engineering initiatives across enterprise web platforms with strong ownership of UI architecture, performance optimization, and development workflows. Driving modern Angular practices, scalable frontend architecture, and AI-assisted development while mentoring engineers and contributing to cross-team technical excellence.
achievements: Led frontend architecture design using modular Angular patterns, feature-based structure, and shared core libraries to ensure scalability, maintainability, and long-term system stability.
Built reusable UI component systems and design-aligned frontend foundations adopted across multiple teams, reducing duplication and accelerating delivery.
Owned frontend code quality standards including folder structure, naming conventions, state handling patterns, and performance best practices.
Defined Git workflows and branching strategies, ensuring clean version control, predictable releases, and collaborative development.
Conducted pull request reviews, providing architectural guidance, enforcing coding standards, improving readability, and mentoring engineers through constructive feedback.
Drove performance optimization initiatives through refactoring, removal of legacy dependencies, lazy loading, and modern Angular best practices.
Integrated analytics and UX insight tooling to support data-driven product decisions and improve customer experience.
Applied AI-assisted development workflows to improve delivery speed, code quality, and developer productivity while reducing repetitive engineering tasks.
Mentored frontend developers on architecture, performance tuning, and optimization techniques, contributing to team growth and engineering maturity.
Collaborated closely with backend, design, QA, and product teams to deliver high-quality features across multiple initiatives.
Provided cross-team technical support by resolving complex UI issues and contributing to shared frontend standards and internal documentation.
Participated in technical interviews and hiring processes for frontend and full-stack roles.
Recognized internally for strong ownership, consistent delivery, and leadership in frontend engineering practices.

description: Enhanced UI consistency across payment portals and integrated frontend features with third-party logistics systems in a hybrid work environment.
achievements: Collaborated with product teams to enhance UI consistency across multiple payment portals
Gained extensive experience integrating frontend features with third-party logistics and shipping systems
Improved payment flow user experience through consistent design patterns
Optimized payment portal performance and cross-platform compatibility

description: Developed full-stack web solutions using Angular, Node.js, and Express.js. Served as technical liaison between stakeholders and engineering teams across finance and administrative sectors.

Acted as technical liaison between stakeholders and engineering teams, leading requirements analysis
Delivered scalable business applications across finance, utilities, and administrative sectors
Led cross-functional collaboration to transform business requirements into technical solutions

Assumed partial leadership in project planning and code review processes
